Uses of Class
com.jgoodies.binding.value.ConverterValueModel

  • Packages that use ConverterValueModel 
    Package Description
    com.jgoodies.binding.value
    Contains the ValueModel interface and hierarchy.

    • Uses of ConverterValueModel in com.jgoodies.binding.value

      Methods in com.jgoodies.binding.value that return ConverterValueModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConverterValueModel<Boolean,Boolean> ConverterFactory.createBooleanNegator(ValueModel booleanSource)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that negates Booleans and leaves null unchanged.
      static ConverterValueModel<Boolean,String> ConverterFactory.createBooleanToStringConverter(ValueModel booleanSubject, String trueText, String falseText)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Booleans to the associated of the two specified strings, and vice versa.

      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Booleans to the associated of the two specified strings, and vice versa.
      static ConverterValueModel<Double,Double> ConverterFactory.createDoubleConverter(ValueModel doubleSource, double multiplier)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Doubles using the specified multiplier.
      static ConverterValueModel<Double,Integer> ConverterFactory.createDoubleToIntegerConverter(ValueModel doubleSource)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Doubles to Integer, and vice versa.

      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Doubles to Integer, and vice versa.

      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Floats using the specified multiplier.

      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Floats to Integer, and vice versa.

      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Floats to Integer, and vice versa.
      static ConverterValueModel<Integer,Integer> ConverterFactory.createIntegerConverter(ValueModel integerSource, double multiplier)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Integers using the specified multiplier.
      static ConverterValueModel<Long,Long> ConverterFactory.createLongConverter(ValueModel longSource, double multiplier)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Long using the specified multiplier.
      static ConverterValueModel<Long,Integer> ConverterFactory.createLongToIntegerConverter(ValueModel longSubject)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts Longs to Integer and vice versa.

      static ConverterValueModel<Object,String> ConverterFactory.createStringConverter(ValueModel source, Format format)
      Creates and returns a ValueModel that converts objects to Strings and vice versa.
